name: bnj1350
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wal(s0, w3a(w0, w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w2, wal(s0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wal(s0, w3a(w0, w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w2, wal(s0, w2))

|- wi(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wal(s0, w3a(w0, w1, w2)))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w2, wal(s0, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

|- wi(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wal(s0, w3a(w0, w1, w2)))
-| wi(w2, wal(s0, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: First-order logic and set theory. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
